 We invite students, doctoral students, and academic staff to attend the Final Conference of the PAOLA Project, held on 20 March 2025 at the AGH University of Krakow, where experts and participants will discuss the future of whistleblowing in academia. 

 Description 

As part of the 
Marie Curie Annual Conference & General Assembly 2025
, an EU-supported PAOLA event (The Pandora Box of Whistleblowing in Academia) will take place at the AGH University. This pioneering initiative is dedicated to promoting transparency, integrity, and accountability in academia. Artur Lesner, the AGH University Equality Advocate, has also been invited to join a discussion panel.

Why attend?

Engage in discussions on academic ethics and best practices

Connect with leading experts, researchers, and fellow students

Be part of a movement shaping a more ethical research environment

📌 
Register now
 – the number of places is limited!

Let’s work together for a more transparent and responsible academia!
